subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|玉|元|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc|t1=jade}} – ancient toys made of jade.

subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=wán,er=y
|c=waan4-2,waan4,faan2
|c_note=waan4-2 - common; waan4 - rare; faan2 - variant, perhaps dialectal influence
|h=pfs=ngòan
|h_note=ngòan - literary (“to play”)
|md=nguàng
|md_note=nguàng - literary (“to play”) (colloquial equivalent is {{zh-l|*客佻}})
|mn=oán/ml:goân/tw:goán
|mn_note=oán - vernacular (俗); goân/goán - literary
|mn-t=nguêng2/nguang2
|mn-t_note=nguêng2 - Chaozhou; nguang2 - Shantou
|w=3hhoe
|ma=y
|cat=v
}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=玩
|c=wun6
|h=pfs=ngóan
|h_note=ngóan - literary (“to tease; toy”)
|md=nguâng

|mn=goán

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[hold]] and [[fondle]]; to [[play]] with; to [[toy]] with; to [[dally]] with
# {{†}} to [[enjoy]]; to [[appreciate]]
# {{†}} [[toy]]; [[plaything]]; [[object]] for [[appreciation]]
# {{†}} to [[trifle]] with; to [[treat]] without [[seriousness]] or [[respect]]
# {{†}} to [[savour]]; to [[deliberate]]

subSections.text:
{{zh-der|fold=1|古玩|好玩:hàowán, hàowàn|寶玩|怠玩|把玩|披玩|探異玩奇|日久玩生|清玩|熟讀玩味|狎玩|玩世|玩世不恭|玩世不羈|玩人喪德|玩其磧礫，不窺玉淵|玩味|玩好|玩弄|玩忽|玩愒|玩日愒歲|玩歲愒日|玩法|玩物|玩物喪志|玩習|玩賞|珍玩|細玩|耽玩|褻玩|賞玩|雅玩}}
